item.title: Creating a Mac Microphone Mute Keyboard Shortcut
item.description: When recording our podcast there is nothing more annoying than playing it back only to find hearing yourself banging away on the keyboard when someone else is speaking. Within Skype there is functionality to mute your microphone input device during an active call. However, the location and size of the button can be a challenge to find throughout a full podcast recording.
